sources.title: The Cobbler | Full Movie | Comedy Drama Fantasy | Adam Sandler | Steve Buscemi
sources.description:
A cobbler, bored of his everyday life, stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to become other people and see the world in a different way.
2014.  Stars: Adam Sandler, Melonie Diaz, Steve Buscemi

metadata.Plot: Max Simkin repairs shoes in the same New York shop that has been in his family for generations. Disenchanted with the grind of daily life, Max stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to step into the lives of his customers and see the world in a new way. Sometimes walking in another man's shoes is the only way one can discover who they really are.
metadata.Actors: Elli, Adam B. Shapiro, Evan Neumann
